overview:
Muhammad Imran Khan is a highly motivated and disciplined individual with strong exposure in SEO/SEM, SMM, SMO & Reputation Management. He has over more than 8 years of practical work experience in Internet Marketing, Search Engine Optimization, Search Engine Marketing, Web Development, Creative Writing and SEO Optimized Content Development.

He played an important role in an international IT&T Magazine and managed its web portal. He has contributed in the completion of various projects successfully, achieved distinctions and promotions. He has all the abilities to take up new challenges, meeting deadlines and achieving personal as well as organizational goals.

He has successfully completed many SEO projects & Social Media Campaigns and achieved high Search Engine Rankings and improved quality traffic within the deadline.
